Class oracle.html.TableHeaderCell 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.TableCell
                   |
                   +----oracle.html.TableDataCell
                           |
                           +----oracle.html.TableHeaderCell
public class TableHeaderCell
extends TableDataCell
Description:

TableHeaderCell encapsulates a TH element

Instructions:

Use this class whenever you want to use a header element in a Dynamic Table.

Example: 

// Create a TableHeaderCell with a simple string as content
TableHeaderCell cell = new TableHeaderCell("Simple Header Cell");

See Also:
TableCell, TableDataCell, DynamicTable

TableHeaderCell(IHtmlItem)
Creates a TableHeaderCell object with content
TableHeaderCell(String)
Creates a TableHeaderCell object
TableHeaderCell(int, int, int, int, boolean, IHtmlItem)
Creates a TableHeaderCell object with specified attributes

endTag()
Returns end Tag for this TableHeaderCell Object
startTag()
Returns start Tag for this TableHeaderCell Object

  public TableHeaderCell(IHtmlItem content)
Creates a TableHeaderCell object with content
Parameters:
content - Content of this cell
TableHeaderCell 
  public TableHeaderCell(String content)
Creates a TableHeaderCell object
Parameters:

TableHeaderCell 
  public TableHeaderCell(int valign,
                         int halign,
                         int rowspan,
                         int colspan,
                         boolean noWrap,
                         IHtmlItem content)
Creates a TableHeaderCell object with specified attributes
Parameters:
valign - Vertical Alignment
halign - Horizontal Alignment
rowspan - Number of rows spanned by cell
colspan - Number of columns spanned by cell
nowrap - Specifies whether to suppress word wrap in TH or TD cell
content - Content of this cell
